name: ZIGZAG peyote beaded bracelet cuff in Orange, Blue, and Grey with JOY/SUNSHINE charm
description:
These color are so great to dress up that favorite pair of jeans! I couldn't be more pleased with this color combination!

I created this bracelet using delica bead in an even count peyote stitch. This bracelet is approx. 7/8 inch wide, and, when fastened, measures approx. 7 1/4 inches long. I completed the bracelet with a snap closure, and it features a lovely charm that has a sunshine on one side and the word "joy" on the other I thought it went fabulous with this "happy" little bracelet! 

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

name: Peyote beaded bracelet cuff in Bronze and multi-colors
description:
I created this bracelet using hex beads and seed beads. I really love the texture that the hex beads add. The seed beads are multi-colored, depending on the lighting, but they pick up a lot of pink and blue hues. They're a wonderful compliment to the bronze hex beads. I've stitched this bracelet in a modified peyote stitch, and it's finished off with a lovely toggle clasp. The bracelet measures approx. 7/8" wide and, when fastened, measures approx. 7" long.

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

name: ZIGZAG (grays and golds) peyote beaded bracelet cuff
description:
I love this new design, and I think you will too. I'm also thrilled with how the color combination turned out. What a great bracelet for going into fall. I'm in love with the funkiness of it. 

I created this bracelet using delica beads and completed it with a slide tube magnetic closure connected to the bracelet ends with a bit of chain. This bracelet is approx. 1 3/4" wide (measuring between the outside zigzag points), and, when fastened, measures approx. 7 5/8" long including the closure. 

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

name: Peyote beaded bracelet cuff in Teal, Gold, and Brown
description:
I created this bracelet using cube beads and seed beads. This bracelet is sturdy and has great texture! I love the color combo! I've stitched this bracelet in a peyote stitch, and it's finished off with a lovely copper toggle clasp. The bracelet measures approx. 1" wide and, when fastened, measures approx. 7 1/4" long.

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

name: Peyote beaded bracelet cuff with pearl fringe in Plum, Olive Green, and Gold
description:
Here are some colors that work so well together! I was inspired by some furniture and decor that I saw and fell in love with recently in a boutique. 

The bracelet is stitched with delica beads in using a peyote stitch. I've incorporated just enough gold delicas to really give it a good sparkle! The glass pearl and seed bead fringe on the edges just gives it that richness that really completes this bracelet. The bracelet is finished with 22K gold plated ribbon ends and a secure snap closure.

When fastened, this bracelet measures approx. 6 3/4" in length, and the base of the bracelet measures about 3/4" wide (7/8" at the fringe edges).

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

name: OVAL beaded peyote earrings in PLUM and STEEL
description:
I love the this color combination, as well as this design! The plum beads are a bit variegated, as you can see in the photo. They're really lovely beads. And the steel colored beads are always a favorite of mine. 

These earrings are done in a pointed oval shapes using the peyote stitch, with all delica beads.. 

These earrings measure approx. 2 1/8" long including the ear wire, and at the widest point of the peyote base, they measure approx. 1/2" wide.

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

These earrings measure about 2 5/8" long including the ear wire, and the widest point of the earrings are about 3/4" wide.

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

These earrings measure approx. 2 1/4" long including the ear wire, and at the widest point of the peyote base, they measure approx. 1 1/2" wide. 

Shipping is FREE for US First Class. If you prefer a different method of shipping, or if it you are an international customer, please contact me to get your rate.

description:

It will look a little different in reality than on paper. With this design and these colors...I could not have been happier with the finished design! I absolutely love these colors together, and I love the design. 

These earrings are done in a tirangle peyote stitch using all delica beads.. The center of the triangles are slightly raised.
